  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600

                LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 244x19
                  text run at (0,0) width 244: "some normal text before the nested table"
